last_episode_to_air.name: Love Selection The Animation
last_episode_to_air.overview:
First Episode: Love Selection is about a man named Daiki-kun who dreams of having sex with the girl he loves under the name Ami-chan. Basically, one of Ami's friends decided that she wanted to have sex before her school life ended, and thought it would be the easiest with someone from class, so she suggested it to class and dragged Ami, and their other friend Yui, into that too. This episode does not contain rape scenes, all of them "mutually" or close to her. There is no old fat man, etc ...

Second Episode: This is the story of "Royal Bust" because he is crazy about one of the servants named Saiko-chan. Little did he know that the restaurant had a "Special Sevice Day" for customers who got quite a lot of points. Finally he had a chance with Saiko-chan, but was cut short after getting a blowjob and not having sex with him. Annoyed to see him with a fat old man, he finally has sex with another servant named Yayoi-chan, who has truly loved him all this time. This episode contains a fat man, a "royal statue," and netorare.
